Name: BeatJunkies
About the game: MUSIC RHYTHM MULTIPLAYER BATTLE! START THE WALL! An Amazing Game From Which You Can Find Out How Good Your Rhythm Sense Is. The game is extremely funny and fun. You can play alone and with your friends from anywhere in the world. Use multiplayer to find out who is better. There are currently 6 levels to show off your musical knowledge and test your reflexes. The task is to catch more notes than your opponent with the arrow that goes around. Press the appropriate key when the arrow reaches the note. If you are better then you can push him off the stage and then you can throw him a cookie :) Get the notes accurately because then your XP results will be better. Are you ready? You like music? Then come on and tell your friends!
